trans-unit.source: description: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: description: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.
trans-unit.target: Shows how to launch the compose email dialog to allow the user to send an email message.

trans-unit.source: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.
trans-unit.target: You can pre-populate the fields of the email with data before showing the dialog.

trans-unit.source: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.
trans-unit.target: The message will not be sent until the user taps the send button.

trans-unit.source: In this article
trans-unit.target: In this article

trans-unit.source: Launch the compose email dialog
trans-unit.target: Launch the compose email dialog

trans-unit.source: Summary and next steps
trans-unit.target: Summary and next steps

trans-unit.source: Related topics
trans-unit.target: Related topics

trans-unit.source: Launch the compose email dialog
trans-unit.target: Launch the compose email dialog

trans-unit.source: Create a new [**EmailMessage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn631270) object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.
trans-unit.target: Create a new [**EmailMessage**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn631270) object and set the data that you want to be pre-populated in the compose email dialog.

trans-unit.source: Call [**ShowComposeNewEmailAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn631269) to show the dialog.
trans-unit.target: Call [**ShowComposeNewEmailAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/Dn631269) to show the dialog.

trans-unit.source: Summary and next steps
trans-unit.target: Summary and next steps

trans-unit.source: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose email dialog.
trans-unit.target: This topic has shown you how to launch the compose email dialog.

trans-unit.source: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an email message, see [Select contacts](selecting-contacts.md).
trans-unit.target: For information on selecting contacts to use as recipients for an email message, see [Select contacts](selecting-contacts.md).

trans-unit.source: See [**PickSingleFileAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/JJ635275) to select a file to use as an email attachment.
trans-unit.target: See [**PickSingleFileAsync**](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/JJ635275) to select a file to use as an email attachment.
